about_the_game:
Ever wondered what To the Moon series would be like if it were an actual turn-based RPG??

Well, here it is anyway.

For just fans of the RPG genre and fans of the To the Moon series alike, load up a save file that's already gone through the first 99 hours of grinding, and play (only) The Last Hour of an Epic To the Moon RPG straight to its conclusion!

Join the already decked out party of Neil, Eva, Roxie, and Rob as they venture the final Lighthouse-shaped Dungeon to defeat the mysterious mastermind big bad boss that await them at the top!

Solve puzzles & defeat the mid-bosses of each section through majestic turn-based combat, using dazzling battle skills like...

IT HAS THE JUICE! (Eva)


ILLUSIONARY BLADE! (Rob)



TAKE IT TO THE FACE! (Neil)


. . . and CATTLING GUN! (Roxie)



Featuring all major characters from the To the Moon series, as they fall under the curse of the enigmatic big baddie atop the tower.

What adventure awaits in their last hour? Who awaits them at the top?! And just why does this game even exist?!?

Wishlist The Last Hour of an Epic To the Moon RPG now! Spread the word now! Only YOU can help us not regret spending time on this!!

name: The Last Hour of an Epic TO THE MOON RPG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz+
  • Graphics: 1024x768 High Color +
  • Sound Card: DirectX®: 9.0+

short_description: You like RPGs, but don't have time to play it all. . . We like RPGs, but don't have time to make it all. . . So here's (only) the LAST HOUR of an EPIC RPG !!
